episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4001_1001_02:
I was following Suicune, and now I’m somewhere
I don’t recognize... What is this place?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4001_1001_04: Are you testing me? I’ll catch up to you this time!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/6801_1001_01:
I won’t stop running if it’s for my dream—even if
I’m all alone!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/6801_1001_02:
Heh, I’m a fan of that attitude—the way you don’t
rely on anyone.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_02: I’ll heal you now. Stay still for a bit.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_03: He’s used to treating Sneasel after battling.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_05:
Speaking of weaklings, the city’s Gym Leader
isn’t here.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_06:
Supposedly they’re taking care of a sick Pokémon
at the Lighthouse.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_07: Hmph. Boo-hoo! Just let sick Pokémon go!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_08: A Pokémon that can’t battle is worthless!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_09: It’s a pain in the neck for me if he can’t battle.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_10: That’s not a very nice way to talk about him, is it?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_12:
That’s why I can’t leave him alone. Especially if
he’s wounded.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_15: Don’t forget to heal your Pokémon too.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_16:
I guess if he really wasn’t taking care of his
Pokémon, he wouldn’t be wearing a sygna suit.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_17:
Yeah. That outfit is proof that they have a strong
bond as a sync pair.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4002_1001_18:
I guess how he feels about Sneasel was obvious
all along.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4003_1001_02:
Then let’s head out for some training. We have
to find our next opponent...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4004_1001_01: How surprising to reunite with you on Pasio!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4004_1001_02:
And it’s even more surprising that you’ve been
accepted by Ho-Oh!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4004_1001_04: And that’s the guy from the Burned Tower...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_01: Eusine is an old friend of mine.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_02:
There’s a Pokémon he’s passionate about, and he’s
been chasing it forever.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_04:
Until Suicune accepts me as a Trainer, I’m going
to follow it wherever it goes!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_06:
Yeah. Unfortunately, this Suicune has already
chosen Kris as its partner.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_07:
But if that partner is a wonderful Trainer like you,
I don’t mind.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_08:
I congratulate you from the bottom of my heart for
being chosen by Suicune, Kris!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_09:
Thank you so much! It makes me so happy to hear
that from you, Eusine!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_10:
Hmph. How kind of you to celebrate someone
else’s success.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_11:
But recently, Suicune has been disappearing when
I’m not looking...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_13:
Hmm. It doesn’t seem like there’s a lack of
trust, but...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_15: Oh, it’s back! Where’d you go this ti—
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_20:
How brave it is! How refreshing it is! How
beautiful it is! And how quickly it moves!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_21:
And its colors are different from the Suicune I’ve
been following!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_22: I can’t believe it! Who knew this was possible?!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_23: What kind of place is Pasio...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_24:
I’m definitely surprised, but something like this
did happen before.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_27: It’s like I’m in a dream...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_28: So, Eusine. What are you going to do now?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_29:
That should be obvious! I’m going to look for
that Suicune!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_30:
You say you’re gonna look for it, but do you have
any clue where it could be?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_31: Of course! For instance, I know...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_34: Let’s split up and find it!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_35: I’ll go with you too, Kris.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_37: What are you going to do?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_38: Sorry, but I’m not working with you.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_39:
Although...finding Suicune and making it my
partner Pokémon wouldn’t be so bad.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_40: I see. That would make us rivals!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_41:
You seem very confident. Wouldn’t you have a
problem if I partnered up with Suicune?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_42:
If Suicune chooses you, there’s nothing I can do
about that.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_43:
It would just mean that you, as a Trainer, were
better suited for Suicune.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_44:
However! No matter who my rival is, I’ll never
give up!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_45: It’s my dream to catch up to Suicune, after all!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_47: Dreams give you courage and energy!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_48:
What about you? Do you have a dream
you’re chasing?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_49: Does it look like I’d have something like that?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_50: I don’t have any dreams I’m telling YOU about.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_51: I see... If you say so.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4005_1001_52:
I hope you manage to find a dream for yourself
one day!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4006_1101_01:
Eusine managed to find Suicune with help from
Morty and Kris, but...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4006_1001_03: I won’t stop following you until I’ve found out what you’re after... You hear me?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4006_1101_04:
Although they kept on trying, nothing worked, and
time passed...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_01:
We haven’t even heard of any sightings of that
strangely colored Suicune lately, have we?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_02: No matter who chases it, they can’t catch it.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_03: I guess everyone just gave up.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_04:
When Suicune appeared for the first time,
everyone was so excited about it. But now...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_05:
Well, there’s that one guy who’s still chasing after
it, I think. I believe his name was Eusine?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_06:
It’s amazing that he’s still chasing it without giving
up, right?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_07:
I don’t think he’s in touch with reality. He’s not
tenacious—he’s just reckless.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_08: He doesn’t understand that he can’t do it.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_10: You all talk big, don’t you?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_12:
We can talk about whatever we want! It’s none of
your business.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_13: Sure. You can say whatever you want.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_14:
But with a weak mentality like that, no wonder
you couldn’t catch up to Suicune.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_17:
You want to test if we’re really as weak as
you say?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_19:
There’s nothing more annoying than people who
can’t do anything unless they’re in a group!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_20: You better not regret it when we make you cry!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_23: What’s wrong—done already? Just all talk, huh?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_26: Looks like you’ve gotten stronger again.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_28:
We’ll leave for now, but we’ll be back, so don’t
you forget...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_29:
The swarm of people pursuing Suicune has
completely dispersed.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_30:
The only one who’s still seriously looking for
Suicune is Eusine.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_31: Yeah, I haven’t given up, but...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_32:
His unwavering persistence in chasing after
Suicune has surprised me.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_33: It’s his dream to be accepted by Suicune.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_34:
I think you can understand pretty well how Eusine
feels, too.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_36:
If we’re talking about something that you want to
happen, no matter what...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_37: Then maybe I do have what he calls a dream.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1001_38: I believe that Eusine’s dream will come true.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4007_1101_40:
Still, Eusine could not catch up with Suicune, and
more time passed...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_01: Finding Suicune is really difficult, isn’t it?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_04:
You’re following a dream that’ll never come true,
and you’re right next to someone who already
fulfilled that same dream.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_05:
Haven’t you thought of giving up on a dream
you can’t reach?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_06: You don’t have a single grudge?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_07:
I’ve never resented anyone or thought of giving
up on my dream. Not even once.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_08: My dream is to be accepted by Suicune...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_09:
But the moments I spend running towards that
dream are equally precious to me.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_10:
Results are obviously important, but the process of
getting there is also something I want to cherish.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_11:
All the time I’ve spent on my dream is also an
important treasure.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_13: Besides, I haven’t been wasting my time aimlessly.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_14: Look. The water here is so pure and clear.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_15:
Pasio’s water is already clean, so usually you
wouldn’t notice this slight difference...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_16:
But I can tell that this water has been purified
by Suicune!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_17:
I found other places with water like this.
By comparing these places, we can predict
Suicune’s movement pattern.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_18:
All that’s left is to anticipate where it will go and
wait for it there!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_20: I can teach you, if you’d like!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_21: I want to be an honest Trainer for Suicune.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4008_1001_22: I’ll tell you about those places, if you want!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_01:
Are you sure you want to give me the chance to
challenge Suicune?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_02:
Even Suicune should know who’s been following it
this whole time.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_03: It’s looking at you, and only you.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_04:
Suicune’s waiting for a Trainer who shows more
passion for it than anyone else!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_05:
You’ve been talking about it so much. Go on and
make your dream come true.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_06: All right! Come on, Suicune. Let’s battle!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_08:
It’s been around ten years since the day I set off
on my journey to find you...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_10:
Oh, Suicune... You look even more brave,
refreshing, and beautiful up close!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_12:
Thank you, Morty! Kris and Silver, too! I thank you
all from the bottom of my heart!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_13: Didn’t expect you’d actually make it happen.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_14:
Yes! After talking about it for so long,
it finally happened!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_15:
You asked me before what my dream is,
didn’t you?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_17: There’re some people I need to defeat.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_18:
I’m gonna surpass them and become the world’s
strongest Trainer...
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_20: And I’ll do it together with my Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_21: I see. What a wonderful dream!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_22:
Well then, Silver. It’s your turn to make your
dream come true.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_23: Heh, no need to tell me!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_24:
Well, since you’ve started chasing your dream,
here’s a gift to cheer you on.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_26:
This is a mysterious Egg I found when I was
exploring Johto.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_27: It might help you fulfill your dream.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_28: I’m very curious... What kind of Egg is it?
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_29:
That’s something to look forward to when
it hatches!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_30: All right, I’ll take it off your hands.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_31:
No matter what Pokémon it is, I’ll train it to
be strong.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4010_1001_32:
Sure! One day you can show me what the two of
you look like as a sync pair!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4011_1001_03:
You weaklings shouldn’t be ganging up and
bothering people.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4011_1001_04:
Tsk. Don’t get cocky just because you’ve got a bit
of talent!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4011_1001_05: We’ll teach you a lesson next time!
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4011_1001_06: You’re too late. There’s nothing left for you.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4011_1001_08:
I’m gonna... No, WE’RE gonna get even stronger
than we are now.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4011_1001_09:
Every moment, I’ll be running at full speed.
I’ll definitely catch up to you.
episode_event_ch0216_ch0133/4011_1001_11: Of course. I’m looking forward to it, Silver!
